鼺字的基本解释

鼺
léi
鼯鼠的别称。

鼺字的汉语字典释义

[①]［léi］
［《集韻》倫爲切，平支，來。］
鼯鼠的别名。

鼺字的康熙字典解释

【亥集下】【鼠字部】　鼺； 康熙笔画：28； 页码：页1529第35
【集韻】倫爲切，音羸。鼯鼠別名。【爾雅翼】鼯鼠，一名?由。一名鸓。又名飛蠝。又名鼺鼠。【晉書·索靖傳】草書狀曰：騰猨飛鼺相奔越。

鼺字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
鼺字的起名意思

暂无。

léi
Another name for flying squirrels.

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［léi］
["Ji Yun" Lun is cut, flat branch, come. ]
An alias for flying squirrels.
Niu
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Jixia] [Mouse Character Department] 　鼺; Kangxi Strokes: 28; Page Number: Page 1529 Page 35
[Jiyun] Lun is cut, sound is lean. Alias for flying squirrels. [Erya Wing] Flying squirrel, one by. A scorpion. Also known as flying beetle. Also known as mole. [Book of Jin·Suo Jing Biography] Cursive script states: Tengxuan Fei Xiangxiang ran over.
